name: Famous Tech Companies and Their Founders
description: Learn about famous tech companies and the people who started them.

flashcards.question: Who is the CEO of Amazon?
Who are the co-founders of Google?
Who founded Oracle?
flashcards.answer: Larry Ellison, Bob Miner, Ed Oates

flashcards.question: Who is the founder of Alibaba?
Who founded Twitter?
flashcards.answer: Jack Dorsey, Noah Glass, Biz Stone, Evan Williams
